<!-- setup the environment -->
```{r r-environment-setup-knitr}
#| cache: false
#| echo: false
#| include: false

list(cache=FALSE,
     message=FALSE,
     warnings=FALSE,
     crop=TRUE) |>
	do.call(what=knitr::opts_chunk$set)

list(crop=knitr::hook_pdfcrop) |>
	do.call(what=knitr::knit_hooks$set)
```

```{r r-environment-setup-domc}
#| cache: false
#| echo: false
#| include: false

#
# example front matter:
#
# ---
# params:
#   resources:
#     value:
#       cores: 2
# ---
#
# ---
# params:
#   resources: !expr list(cores=2)
# ---
#

params |>
	purrr::pluck('resources', 'cores', .default=1) |>
	doMC::registerDoMC()
```
